title: Ratio Imaging Analyzer (RIA): A Lightweight, Standalone Python Tool for Portable Ratiometric Fluorescence Analysis
description: Ratio Imaging Analyzer (RIA) is a lightweight, open-source desktop application designed to streamline the processing of ratiometric imaging data, specifically for genetically encoded fluorescent sensors.

creators.name: Wang, Kui
creators.affiliation: Institute of Neuroscience, Center for Excellence in Brain Science and Intelligence Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences
